about.title: Our Story
about.subTitle: #YourFeelGoodTreats
about.description: Chuyu journey is defined by the sincerity and heartwarming care we infuse into every drink. Inspired by the source of pure happiness, the authenticity and fulfillment that go into crafting each beverage are tangible, and this is what we cherish and aim to spread continuously, uninterrupted joy and happiness.Our commitment is to spread joy continuously, and bringing happiness through #YourFeelGoodTreats
about.value: As a brand, we are paving a path for people to truly enjoy life through “Feel-Good” & “Treats”, two different concept blended into one value that defined us differently from other brands.

career.title: Career
testimony: The product I received is of high quality and matches the description on the website. The delivery was also fast and secure. I will definitely shop here again!
My shopping experience here was very pleasant. The whole process was easy and efficient. The staff is very friendly and professional. I highly recommend it!

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: In Chuyu, we are fully committed to being responsible for a positive work culture across all hierarchies, by creating a fair work-ground area through dialogue and discussion, where we support all kinds of opinions, as part of collective evaluation. We value our people passions, experience, strength, and potential!
perks: Promotion : We support all of our team to further develop their skills and knowledge to paving their own career path.
Fair Work Ground Area : Yes, in Chuyu we believe a fair work-ground area is a must to maintain the positivity in the team, and improving.
Wellness benefits : We subsidised health support for you.
Travelling for Work & Fun : Explore new offices, outlets and cities you never seen before!
